PHP.OS.ChrootFailedThis class indicates, that a chroot has failed
PHP.OS.ChrootListenerDescribes a class as a potential receiver for events related to process chroot calls
ClassLoaderThis is the basic class loader for the framework
ClassLoaderCallbackInterfaceThis interface states, that the ClassLoader should call back the class on load
ClassLoaderExceptionGeneric exception for the ClassLoader
PHP.Util.CollectionThis is a generic Collection (array) class, which can be used as an object container and overridden by child classes
PHP.Lang.ComparableSimplifies comparison of objects
PHP.OS.DaemonThis interface ensures, that all functions required by PHP exist
PHP.OS.DaemonContextThis is a daemonizing toolkit for classes, that implement PHP
PHP.Lang.ExceptionThis is the standard system exception extended from the PHP native one
PHP.OS.ExceptionThis indicates a generic OS level exception
PHP.IO.FileThis class represents a file and contains the utilities for file manipulation
PHP.IO.FileNotFoundExceptionIndicates, that a given file was not found
PHP.OS.ForkFailedThis class indicates, that a fork has failed
PHP.OS.ForkListenerDescribes a class as a potential receiver for events related to process forks
PHP.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsExceptionIndicates, that some sort of index (array, string) was out of bounds
PHP.Net.INET4AddressThis class represents IPv4 addresses
PHP.Net.INET6AddressThis class represents IPv6 addresses
PHP.Net.INETAddressThis class is an abstract for the IPv4 and IPv6 address classes created as INET4Address and INET6Address
PHP.Net.INETAddressFormatErrorThis exception indicates, that an address is of invalid format
PHP.Net.INETAddressTypeErrorThis exception indicates, that an INETAddress is not of the required type
PHP.Net.INETExceptionThis is a generic definition for the INET type exception to make catching it easy
PHP.Net.INETInvalidMaskThis exception indicates, that an invalid INET mask was provided
PHP.Net.INETRangeA network range representation for both IPv4 and IPv6 ranges
PHP.Net.INETUnknownHostThis exception indicates, that an address has hit an unknown host error
PHP.IO.IOExceptionThis exception indicates, that some sort of input/output error occured
PHP.Util.MapThis is a generic Map (key-value) class, which can be used as an object container and overridden by child classes
PHP.Lang.MathThis class contains the standard mathematical functions
PHP.Lang.NotImplementedExceptionIndicates, that some sort of function was not implemented or no driver responsible for it could be found
PHP.Lang.NullPointerExceptionThrown when an application attempts to use null in a case where an object is required
PHP.Lang.ObjectGeneric ancestor class for all in-system classes except Exceptions
PHP.OS.ProcessThis class contains all process-related functionality
PHP.OS.ProcessExitInformationThis class contains all relevant information, that can be collected, if a process exits
PHP.Util.RandomUtility for generating random numbers
PHP.OS.SetGIDFailedThis class indicates, that a setgid has failed
PHP.OS.SetUIDFailedThis class indicates, that a setuid has failed
PHP.OS.SignalThis class contains constants and functions related to signal handling
PHP.Lang.TypeErrorThis Exception states, that an invalid type was provided
PHP.Lang.ValueErrorThis Exception states, that an invalid value was provided
